p: Cation substitution has demonstrated utility in the tailoring of the thermodynamic and kinetic properties in borohydrides [ 22, 266]. A similar approach has been applied to alanates, for which LiAlH 4 or NaAlH 4 are frequently used as starting materials due to their reactivity. These alanates react with other metal hydrides to form mixed cation alanates. The reactions can be generalized as [ 267]: M’AlH 4 + 2MH → M 2M’AlH 6, (84)
